article: Tina and Kate  _  work in a supermarket. They are best friends and they enjoy  working  together.Tina and Katie are young and always happy. They like telling  _  and watching programmes about music on TV. However, they do not like their boss,Mr Green ,  _  he is very strict and always shouts  _  them. Once, Mr Green shouted  _  loudly at Tina that he made her cry. Tina and Katie stop  _  jokes when Mr Green is nearby. Mr Green likes playing  _  very much. He plays tennis three times a week and  takes  part in many tennis matches, but he never  won  any tennis titles. One day, Mr Green  _  at work as usual and smiled at Tina and as he gave  _  two big boxes of chocolates each. The girls were shocked. At the end of the day,they found out the reason  _  Mr Green was so  _  . He won his  _  title in a local competition!
